remarks: Scalar multiplication in a structure product is pointwise.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:

prdsbasmpt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
prdsvscaval.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` Y ) $.

prdsvscaval.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdsvscaval.r $e |- ( ph -> R Fn I ) $.

prdsvscaval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. B ) $.
prdsvscaval $p |- ( ph -> ( F .x. G ) = ( x e. I |-> ( F ( .s ` ( R ` x ) ) ( G ` x ) ) ) ) $.
